titles.title: To temporarily exempt from restrictions on carriage in coastwise trade the transport of petroleum and petroleum products between ports designated by the President.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 10/18/2000--Introduced. Exempts from certain restrictions on carriage in coastwise trade the transport of petroleum and petroleum products between any two U.S. ports designated by the President.
